Article.Title: 7 000 People Are Watching Two Fish Play Street Fighter
Article.Content: Two fish are playing Street Fighter over on Twitch, and more than 7,000 people are watching the mayhem. Or, partial mayhem. Sometimes the fish don’t swim in a pattern that leads to much confrontation. That said, the game is afloat, with the fish “Aquarius” taking on “Robert the Bruce.” In case you were wondering, this is precisely what the Internet is for. H/T The Verge.
